page.title: 13ROBINSON BROS-WEST SLEEKBURN
page.content: Robinson Bros factory situated at West Sleekburn produces two chemicals.One of them is a{drug}intermedial for stomach ulcers and the other is a {rubber accelerator}to be added to tyres.The firm employs 68 people of both sexes.The main firm is situated in West Bromich Albion and was founded by three brothers. They sell their products to other companies such as Goodyear and other tire manufacturers.The process for making these products is very complicated.First{hydrochloric acid} must be boiled and condensed.Then chemicals are added and put in reaction tanks.They are mixed thoroughly and dried into pellets which are then ground into powder.{Caustic soda}is also used in the process.
